description: The mincemeat in this recipe is quick to prepare and needs no time to mature, making these an easy festive treat to bake.
name: Mince Pies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 190°C. To make the mincemeat, grate the apple (including the skin) into a large bowl. Add the melted butter, sultanas, raisins, currants, mixed peel, nuts, lemon zest, mixed spice, brandy or whisky, and sugar. Mix until well combined. Add the banana and mix again.

Roll out the pastry on a lightly floured work surface to a thickness of 2mm and cut out 18 circles using the larger biscuit cutter. Re-roll the pastry, and cut 18 smaller circles or festive shapes, such as stars.
Line fairy cake tins with the larger pastry circles, and place a heaped teaspoon of mincemeat in each case. Top with the smaller circles or shapes.
Chill for 10 minutes, then bake for 10-12 minutes or until the pastry is golden. Carefully remove from the tins and cool on a wire rack. Dust with icing sugar to serve.
